Flow.description: 20211101 JK - Get StandardPricebook from get Records instead of fixed Id 20211103 JK - Removed the creation of the Opportunity Product 20211105 JK - Added functionality to set Contact to Active on conversion when if the contact was set to inactive prior to the conversion. 20211108 JK - Updated function to Name the Opportunity the same as the selected Product 20211119 HdG - Added update of Interaction after convert 20211203 HdG - Added creation of Account Contact Relationship 20211216 RF - Change screen component visibility rules, enrich field mapping 20220318 RF - Enrich Create new Opportunity mapping to include Campaign from Lead 20220420 HdG - Add Operating Company to the new opportunity mapping 20220610 MR add Salesseason to Create opportunity 20230123 CH - Update Professional = true for NH Professional leads 20230403 CH - Fixed opportunity opco assignment for professional 20230413 CH - Fixed default opportunity record type for NH Prof & added pricebook assignment for opps

formulas.name: forOpportunityRT
formulas.expression: IF(ISPICKVAL({!sov_Lead.OperatingCompany__c}, "Noordhoff Professional"), {!$Label.OpportunityNoordhoffProfessional},CASE({!GetUser.Segment__c}, "Liber University",{!$Label.OpportunityLiberUniversity}, "Liber School",{!$Label.OpportunityLiberSchool}, "Noordhoff PE",{!$Label.OpportunityNoordhoffBao}, "Noordhoff SE",{!$Label.OpportunityNoordhoffVo}, "Noordhoff HE",{!$Label.OpportunityNoordhoffHo}, "Noordhoff VE",{!$Label.OpportunityNoordhoffMbo}, {!varDefaultOpportunityRecordType}))

Flow.label: Convert Lead

fields.name: ContactName
fields.fieldText:
When no Contact has been selected a new Contact will be created:

First Name {!sov_Lead.FirstName}

Last Name: {!sov_Lead.LastName}

fields.name: convertedMessage
fields.fieldText: This Lead has already been converted and cannot be updated

fields.name: AccountURL
fields.fieldText: Account: {!soc_Account.Name} ﻿

fields.name: ContactURL
fields.fieldText: Contact: {!soc_Contact.Name}

fields.name: OpportunityURL
fields.fieldText: Opportunity: {!soc_Opportunity.Name}
